CustomField.description: The full mailing address, including Mailing Street 2 and Mailing Country values, if not blank (read-only).
CustomField.formula: hed__MailingStreet__c & BR() & IF(ISBLANK(hed__MailingStreet2__c), "", hed__MailingStreet2__c & BR()) & IF(ISBLANK(hed__MailingCity__c), "", hed__MailingCity__c & ", ") & hed__MailingState__c & " " & hed__MailingPostalCode__c & IF(ISBLANK(hed__MailingCountry__c), "", BR() & hed__MailingCountry__c)
CustomField.label: Mailing Address
